name: Plant Gone Bad (PGB)
description:
The plant has suffered an H2S (Hydrogen Sulfide) leak. H2S is deadly above 300PPM (parts per million).
 It is the responsibility of the main operator to shut off the H2S supply valve to the plant in the event of a leak.
Explore the facility in search of the keys and enjoy the pre-zombie atmosphere.
(Zombies may be added later on)
